backend/main.mo: Defines the backend actor with authorization, storage, Stripe mixins, and data models for users, listings, bookings, and related domain types.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping header‑logo‑related feature requirements to affected files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing major frontend components, pages, and configuration files for build reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH theme variables, dark mode tokens, and global background/foreground styling.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry file with meta tags, SEO settings, icons, and root div for mounting the frontend app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the app router, theme provider, query client, and all application routes including policy pages and property submission.
frontend/src/components/AvailabilityCoun: Displays live availability counts for property categories with loading skeletons and animated UI cards.
frontend/src/components/AvailabilityModa: Empty file placeholder for an availability modal component.
frontend/src/components/BookingSteps.tsx: Renders a three-step booking guide with icons and category-based visuals.
frontend/src/components/CategoryGrid.tsx: Empty file placeholder for a category grid component.
frontend/src/components/ExploreSection.t: Empty file placeholder for an explore section component.
frontend/src/components/FeaturedListings: Fetches and displays featured listings with skeletons and variant-based listing cards.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders the site footer with branding, links, social icons, and contact info.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Implements a navigation header with auth handling, user/admin checks, and route navigation.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Empty file placeholder for a hero section component.
Displays an India map with animated city markers showing active and coming-soon locations.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Defines the app layout with header, footer, routed content, and conditional profile-setup modal.
frontend/src/components/ListingCard.tsx: A customizable listing card component showing images, ratings, availability, category icons, and navigation to details.
frontend/src/components/ListingCard3D.ts: A 3D‑styled animated listing card displaying images, ratings, availability, and category icons with hover effects.
frontend/src/components/ListingDetailMod: Empty placeholder file for a listing detail modal.
frontend/src/components/MapSection.tsx: Displays an animated map section with event markers, bouncing pins, and floating info badges.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: A modal for creating a user profile with fields for name, email, phone, and owner status, saving via API.
frontend/src/components/PropertyStatusBa: Renders a status badge for property availability with icons and styling based on status.
frontend/src/components/ReviewSection.ts: Shows listing reviews, allows logged‑in users to submit new reviews with rating and text.
frontend/src/components/StarRating.tsx: Reusable star rating component supporting interactive selection and partial fill display.
frontend/src/components/TestimonialBubbl: Empty placeholder file for testimonial bubbles.
frontend/src/components/TrustBadge.tsx: React memoized badge component rendering gradient-styled labels with optional icon based on variant and size.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider managing Internet Identity auth state, login flow, and stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks wrapping actor calls for user profiles, listings, reviews, and related backend data.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styles defining fonts, color variables, animations, and base theming.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App bootstrap file setting up QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering the root component.
frontend/src/pages/AboutUsPage.tsx: Styled About Us page describing STYO with sections for company registration and leadership details.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Admin dashboard page handling user, listing, notifications, and city charge data with actions like quick publish and free‑trial mode toggles.
frontend/src/pages/BookingPolicyPage.tsx: Static booking policy page rendering terms, disclaimers, and sections with styled UI elements.
frontend/src/pages/CategoryWorldPage.tsx: Displays a grid of accommodation categories that navigate to filtered listings when clicked.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page showcasing category and stay‑type cards, maps, and availability counters using lazy‑loaded components.
frontend/src/pages/ListingPage.tsx: Listing browser with category filtering, dynamic routing, and lazy‑loaded map and 3D listing cards.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPolicyPage.tsx: Renders a styled privacy policy page with scrollable sections describing data use and user privacy commitments.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Displays and edits user profile data with save and logout actions, using hooks for identity and backend sync.
frontend/src/pages/PropertyManagementPag: Provides interfaces to create, edit, and manage property listings tied to the logged‑in owner.
frontend/src/pages/PublicPropertySubmiss: Public form for submitting property listings with validation, image uploads, and backend submission.
frontend/src/pages/RefundPolicyPage.tsx: Renders a styled refund policy page detailing conditions for the ₹99 unlock‑fee refund.
frontend/src/pages/TermsConditionsPage.t: Renders a styled Terms & Conditions page with scrollable sections, headers, and disclaimer content.
frontend/src/pages/UnlockPage.tsx: Displays a property unlock flow allowing users to view contact details after authentication and triggering backend unlock requests.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read, store, persist, and clear URL parameters using query strings, hash fragments, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions including colors, shadows, animations, and content paths.
project_state.json: Describes current project state, known issues, and feature requirements for updating the navbar logo sizing and alignment.
